games.title: XO
games.description: Classic XO game. You can choose to play against the computer or a friend. X or O.
games.goal: Form a line of three squares.
tips: Choose the game mode: against the computer or a friend.
Try to prevent your opponent from forming a complete line.
Focusing on the center squares gives an advantage.

games.title: Sus
games.description: A game similar to XO where one player has the letter S and the other has U.
games.goal: Try to collect sequences of SUS.
tips: Choose the player or computer at the start.
Focus on preventing your opponent from collecting their points.

games.title: Piano
games.description: A game where you press the keys before they reach the bottom of the screen. Pressing the wrong place or reaching the ground makes you lose. Speed gradually increases with score.
games.goal: Try to survive as long as possible.
tips: Focus on the falling keys.
Wrong press causes a life loss.
The speed increases as your score increases.

games.title: Dodge Monsters
games.description: Avoid moving monsters for as long as possible. As your score increases, the monsters' speed increases.
games.goal: Try to survive as long as possible.
tips: Move quickly to avoid monsters.
Speed gradually increases with score.
Try to anticipate monster movements to dodge them easily.

games.title: Aliens Shooter
games.description: Shoot the enemies coming from the top. There are different types of enemies. As your score increases, enemy speed and fire rate increase.
games.goal: Try to survive as long as possible.
tips: Keep an eye on ammo.
Strong enemies need two hits to defeat.
Try to avoid bullets coming from enemies.

games.title: The Jumper
games.description: Control the character to jump on the blocks accurately. As your score increases, the blocks become smaller, the distance between them grows, and moving blocks speed up.
games.goal: Try to climb as high as possible.
tips: Focus on timing your jumps accurately.
With each score increase, expect changes in block size and movement.
Maintain balance to avoid falling.

games.title: Whack Monsters
games.description: Hit the good monsters to earn points, don't hit the evil ones!
controls: Click on the monster when it appears
games.goal: Collect the highest score possible before losing all hearts.
tips: Focus on the colors.
Don't hit the blue monsters.
The game speeds up over time.

games.title: Shooter
games.description: Defend yourself and shoot enemies before they reach you.
games.goal: Kill as many enemies as possible.
tips: Don't shoot empty space.
Red enemies are stronger.
